trans-unit.source: Create a digital marketing campaign on Azure App Service Web Apps
trans-unit.target: Create a digital marketing campaign on Azure App Service Web Apps

trans-unit.source: This guide provides a technical overview of how to use Azure App Service Web Apps to create digital marketing campaigns. This includes deployment, social media integration, scaling strategies, and monitoring.
trans-unit.target: This guide provides a technical overview of how to use Azure App Service Web Apps to create digital marketing campaigns. This includes deployment, social media integration, scaling strategies, and monitoring.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Azure App Service</linkText><title></title> Web Apps is a great choice for digital marketing campaigns.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Azure App Service</linkText><title></title> Web Apps is a great choice for digital marketing campaigns.

trans-unit.source: Digital marketing campaigns are typically short-lived and are meant to drive short-term marketing goals.
trans-unit.target: Digital marketing campaigns are typically short-lived and are meant to drive short-term marketing goals.

trans-unit.source: There are two main scenarios to consider.
trans-unit.target: There are two main scenarios to consider.

trans-unit.source: In the first scenario, a third-party marketing firm creates and manages the campaign for their customer for the duration of the promotion.
trans-unit.target: In the first scenario, a third-party marketing firm creates and manages the campaign for their customer for the duration of the promotion.

trans-unit.source: A second scenario involves the marketing firm creating and then transferring ownership of the digital marketing campaign resources to their customer.
trans-unit.target: A second scenario involves the marketing firm creating and then transferring ownership of the digital marketing campaign resources to their customer.

trans-unit.source: The customer then runs and manages the digital marketing campaign on their own.
trans-unit.target: The customer then runs and manages the digital marketing campaign on their own.

trans-unit.source: is a good match for both scenarios.
trans-unit.target: is a good match for both scenarios.

trans-unit.source: If you want to get started with Azure App Service before signing up for an Azure account, go to <linkText>Try App Service</linkText><title></title>, where you can immediately create a short-lived starter web app in App Service.
trans-unit.target: If you want to get started with Azure App Service before signing up for an Azure account, go to <linkText>Try App Service</linkText><title></title>, where you can immediately create a short-lived starter web app in App Service.

trans-unit.source: No credit cards required; no commitments.
trans-unit.target: No credit cards required; no commitments.

trans-unit.source: Below is an example of a global, multi-channel digital marketing campaign using App Service Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: Below is an example of a global, multi-channel digital marketing campaign using App Service Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: It demonstrates what you can do simply by composing App Service Web Apps together with other services with minimal technical investments.
trans-unit.target: It demonstrates what you can do simply by composing App Service Web Apps together with other services with minimal technical investments.

trans-unit.source: Click on an element in the topography to read more about it.
trans-unit.target: Click on an element in the topography to read more about it.

trans-unit.source: <object type="image/svg+xml" data="https://sidneyhcontent.blob.core.windows.net/documentation/digital-marketing-notitle.svg" width="100%" height="100%"></object>
trans-unit.target: <object type="image/svg+xml" data="https://sidneyhcontent.blob.core.windows.net/documentation/digital-marketing-notitle.svg" width="100%" height="100%"></object>

trans-unit.source: This guide presents some of the most common areas and tasks that are aligned with running a digital marketing campaign in Azure App Service Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: This guide presents some of the most common areas and tasks that are aligned with running a digital marketing campaign in Azure App Service Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: However, there are other common solutions that you can implement in App Service Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: However, there are other common solutions that you can implement in App Service Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: To review these solutions, see the other guides on <linkText>Global Web Presence</linkText><title></title> and <linkText>Business Applications</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: To review these solutions, see the other guides on <linkText>Global Web Presence</linkText><title></title> and <linkText>Business Applications</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Quickly create new web apps from a popular CMS in the gallery or bring your existing web assets to App Service Web Apps from a variety of languages and frameworks.
trans-unit.target: Quickly create new web apps from a popular CMS in the gallery or bring your existing web assets to App Service Web Apps from a variety of languages and frameworks.

trans-unit.source: The Azure Marketplace provides templates from the popular website content management systems (CMS), such as [Orchard], [Umbraco], Drupal, and [WordPress].
trans-unit.target: The Azure Marketplace provides templates from the popular website content management systems (CMS), such as [Orchard], [Umbraco], Drupal, and [WordPress].

trans-unit.source: You can create a web app using your favorite CMS flavor.
trans-unit.target: You can create a web app using your favorite CMS flavor.

trans-unit.source: You can choose from various database backends to meet your needs, including [Azure SQL Database] and [MySQL].
trans-unit.target: You can choose from various database backends to meet your needs, including [Azure SQL Database] and [MySQL].

trans-unit.source: Your existing web assets can run on Web Apps, whether they are .NET, PHP, Java, Node.js, or Python.
trans-unit.target: Your existing web assets can run on Web Apps, whether they are .NET, PHP, Java, Node.js, or Python.

trans-unit.source: You can move them to Web Apps using your familiar [FTP] tools.
trans-unit.target: You can move them to Web Apps using your familiar [FTP] tools.

trans-unit.source: If you frequently create digital marketing campaigns, it is possible that you have existing web assets in a source control management system.
trans-unit.target: If you frequently create digital marketing campaigns, it is possible that you have existing web assets in a source control management system.

trans-unit.source: You can deploy to Web Apps directly from popular source control options, such as [Visual Studio], [Visual Studio Online], and [Git] - local, GitHub, BitBucket, DropBox, Mercurial, etc..
trans-unit.target: You can deploy to Web Apps directly from popular source control options, such as [Visual Studio], [Visual Studio Online], and [Git] - local, GitHub, BitBucket, DropBox, Mercurial, etc..

trans-unit.source: Stay agile by continuously publishing directly from your existing source control and run A/B tests in App Service Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: Stay agile by continuously publishing directly from your existing source control and run A/B tests in App Service Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: During the planning, prototyping, and early development of a web app, you and your customer can look at real working versions of the campaign app before it goes live by [deploying to a staging slot] of your web app.
trans-unit.target: During the planning, prototyping, and early development of a web app, you and your customer can look at real working versions of the campaign app before it goes live by [deploying to a staging slot] of your web app.

trans-unit.source: By integrating source control with App Service Web Apps, you can [continuously publish] to a staging slot, and swap it into production with no downtime when it is ready.
trans-unit.target: By integrating source control with App Service Web Apps, you can [continuously publish] to a staging slot, and swap it into production with no downtime when it is ready.

trans-unit.source: Also, when planning changes to a live web app, you can easily [run A/B tests] on the proposed updates using the Test in Production feature in and analyze real user behavior to help you make informed decisions on app design.
trans-unit.target: Also, when planning changes to a live web app, you can easily [run A/B tests] on the proposed updates using the Test in Production feature in and analyze real user behavior to help you make informed decisions on app design.

trans-unit.source: Your digital marketing campaign in App Service Web Apps can integrate with social media by authenticating with popular providers like Facebook and Twitter.
trans-unit.target: Your digital marketing campaign in App Service Web Apps can integrate with social media by authenticating with popular providers like Facebook and Twitter.

trans-unit.source: For an example of this approach with an ASP.NET application, see [Create an ASP.NET MVC app with auth and SQL DB and deploy to Azure App Service].
trans-unit.target: For an example of this approach with an ASP.NET application, see [Create an ASP.NET MVC app with auth and SQL DB and deploy to Azure App Service].

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, each social media site typically provides information on other ways to integrate with it from .NET and many other frameworks.
trans-unit.target: Furthermore, each social media site typically provides information on other ways to integrate with it from .NET and many other frameworks.

trans-unit.source: Enrich your digital marketing campaign with other Azure services, such as:
trans-unit.target: Enrich your digital marketing campaign with other Azure services, such as:

trans-unit.source: Upload and stream videos globally with [Azure Media Services]
trans-unit.target: Upload and stream videos globally with [Azure Media Services]

trans-unit.source: Send emails to users with [SendGrid service in Azure Marketplace]
trans-unit.target: Send emails to users with [SendGrid service in Azure Marketplace]

trans-unit.source: Establish presence on Windows, iOS, and Android devices with [Mobile Services]
trans-unit.target: Establish presence on Windows, iOS, and Android devices with [Mobile Services]

trans-unit.source: Send push notification to millions of devices with [Notification Hub]
trans-unit.target: Send push notification to millions of devices with [Notification Hub]

trans-unit.source: Go global by serving regional sites with Azure Traffic Manager and delivering content lightning fast with Azure CDN.
trans-unit.target: Go global by serving regional sites with Azure Traffic Manager and delivering content lightning fast with Azure CDN.

trans-unit.source: To serve global customers in their respective regions, use [Azure Traffic Manager] to route site visitors to a regional site that provides the best performance.
trans-unit.target: To serve global customers in their respective regions, use [Azure Traffic Manager] to route site visitors to a regional site that provides the best performance.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can spread the site load evenly across multiple copies of your web app hosted in multiple regions.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, you can spread the site load evenly across multiple copies of your web app hosted in multiple regions.

trans-unit.source: Deliver your static content lightning fast to users globally by [integrating your web app with Azure CDN].
trans-unit.target: Deliver your static content lightning fast to users globally by [integrating your web app with Azure CDN].

trans-unit.source: Azure CDN caches static content in the [CDN node] closest to the user, which minimizes latency and connections to your web app.
trans-unit.target: Azure CDN caches static content in the [CDN node] closest to the user, which minimizes latency and connections to your web app.

trans-unit.source: Optimize your web app by scaling automatically with Autoscale, caching with Azure Redis Cache, running background tasks with WebJobs, and maintaining high availability with Azure Traffic Manager.
trans-unit.target: Optimize your web app by scaling automatically with Autoscale, caching with Azure Redis Cache, running background tasks with WebJobs, and maintaining high availability with Azure Traffic Manager.

trans-unit.source: The ability of App Service Web Apps to [scale up and out] is perfect for unpredictable workloads, which is the case with digital marketing campaigns.
trans-unit.target: The ability of App Service Web Apps to [scale up and out] is perfect for unpredictable workloads, which is the case with digital marketing campaigns.

trans-unit.source: Scale out your web app manually through the <linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title>, programmatically through the [Service Management API] or [PowerShell scripting], or automatically through the Autoscale feature.
trans-unit.target: Scale out your web app manually through the <linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title>, programmatically through the [Service Management API] or [PowerShell scripting], or automatically through the Autoscale feature.

trans-unit.source: In the Standard tier, Autoscale enables you to scale out a web app automatically based on CPU utilization.
trans-unit.target: In the Standard tier, Autoscale enables you to scale out a web app automatically based on CPU utilization.

trans-unit.source: This feature helps you maximize agility and minimize cost at the same time by scaling out the web app only when needed based on user activity.
trans-unit.target: This feature helps you maximize agility and minimize cost at the same time by scaling out the web app only when needed based on user activity.

trans-unit.source: For best practices, see [Troy Hunt]'s [10 things I learned about rapidly scaling web apps with Azure].
trans-unit.target: For best practices, see [Troy Hunt]'s [10 things I learned about rapidly scaling web apps with Azure].

trans-unit.source: Make your web app more responsive with the [Azure Redis Cache].
trans-unit.target: Make your web app more responsive with the [Azure Redis Cache].

trans-unit.source: Use it to cache data from backend databases and other things such as the [ASP.NET session state] and [output cache].
trans-unit.target: Use it to cache data from backend databases and other things such as the [ASP.NET session state] and [output cache].

trans-unit.source: Maintain high availability of your web app using [Azure Traffic Manager].
trans-unit.target: Maintain high availability of your web app using [Azure Traffic Manager].

trans-unit.source: Using the Failover method, Traffic Manager automatically routes traffic to a secondary site if there is a problem on the primary site.
trans-unit.target: Using the Failover method, Traffic Manager automatically routes traffic to a secondary site if there is a problem on the primary site.

trans-unit.source: Stay up-to-date on your web app's performance with Azure or third-party tools.
trans-unit.target: Stay up-to-date on your web app's performance with Azure or third-party tools.

trans-unit.source: Receive alerts on critical web app events.
trans-unit.target: Receive alerts on critical web app events.

trans-unit.source: Gain user insight easily with Application Insight or with web log analytics from HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Gain user insight easily with Application Insight or with web log analytics from HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Get a [quick glance] of the web app's current performance metrics and resource quotas in the web app's blade in the <linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title>. For a 360° view of your application across availability, performance and usage, use [Azure Application Insights] to give you fast & powerful troubleshooting, diagnostics and usage insights. Or, use a third-party tool like [New Relic] to provide advanced monitoring data for your web apps.
trans-unit.target: Get a [quick glance] of the web app's current performance metrics and resource quotas in the web app's blade in the <linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title>. For a 360° view of your application across availability, performance and usage, use [Azure Application Insights] to give you fast & powerful troubleshooting, diagnostics and usage insights. Or, use a third-party tool like [New Relic] to provide advanced monitoring data for your web apps.

trans-unit.source: In the Standard tier, monitor app responsiveness receive email notifications whenever your web app becomes unresponsive.
trans-unit.target: In the Standard tier, monitor app responsiveness receive email notifications whenever your web app becomes unresponsive.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Receive Alert Notifications and Manage Alert Rules in Azure].
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [How to: Receive Alert Notifications and Manage Alert Rules in Azure].
